messages.text: Anyone using Julia Yao for computational chem?

elements.text: Anyone using Julia Yao for computational chem?

messages.text: <@U01GC3N3ZJT> set the channel purpose: Julia for Chemistry
<@U01GC3N3ZJT> set the channel purpose: Julia for Chemistry

Hello everyone. I'm Anant, a junior applying for GSoC this term under <https://github.com/aced-differentiate/|Alchemy.jl> - an ecosystem for machine learning on atomic systems. The work I propose aims to introduce, and improve upon existing methods for property prediction of crystalline materials, in Julia. Considering the domain-relevance, I thought I'd drop a <https://docs.google.com/document/d/12Hsez0D2XUamYDYBzn1Ij2s-cFam41GsuLo_OxTpKec/edit|link to my proposal> here too, and hopefully get some valuable feedback from anyone here who would have the time to go through it. Eager too see what you all think of it. Thanks in advance!
